# sharedService

**Type Property**

A single, shared guidance service object.

## Declaration

```swift
static let sharedService: ElectricityGuidance.Service
```

## Discussion

Use this object to interact with guidance services in your app.

## Getting the electricity guidance data

- **ElectricityGuidance.Service**: An interface for obtaining electricity guidance data.
